constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 48 (Thursday, March 17, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. FOSTER:
H.R. 7120.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
This bill is enacted pursuant to the power granted to
Congress under Article I. Section 8, Clauses 1 and 18 of the
United States Constitution.
[Page H3828]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Consumer Protection and Commerce.

title: DASHBOARD Act of 2022
